entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
